channel.title: CVE Feed for Microsoft Corporation -- Windows Device Guard
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Microsoft Corporation -- Windows Device Guard

item.title: CVE-2017-8746|2024-08-05T16:48:22.647Z -- microsoft%20corporation -- windows%20device%20guard
item.description: Windows Device Guard in Windows 10 1607, 1703, and Windows Server 2016 allows A security feature bypass vulnerability due to how PowerShell exposes functions and processes user supplied code, aka "Device Guard Security Feature Bypass Vulnerability".
